summary:
Process engineer with 5+ years experience in semiconductor industry, passionate about R&D. 

Innovation, improvement and hands-on mindset, with technical and technological problem solving skills, capable of developing and qualifying new processes. 

Specialized with extensive knowledge in the area of lithography: Optical Lithography (Heidelberg Direct Write Laser, SUSS Mask Aligner and ASML Wafer Stepper), Electron Beam Lithography (Vistec EBPG 5200 100kV) and NanoImprint Lithography (Obducat EITRE).

Positive, flexible and self-motivated. Able to set priorities and change focus. 
  
Background in Biomedical Engineering and Nanotechnology. Highly qualified in a variety of micro and nanofabrication techniques in cleanroom environment (including lithography, thin film deposition, etching and metrology). Solid experience in devices microfabrication for molecular diagnostics, photonics and automotive applications.

Strong sense of humanity, cooperation and communication skills.

profile_positions.title: Process Equipment Engineer
Research Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Part of a product-oriented biotech start-up focused on delivery fully portable and easy to use molecular diagnostic device. 

Key role: Responsible for microfabrication process of magnetoresistive biochips in 6" wafers (Magnomics core technology) from wafer level up to final device and for implementation of quality control in different phases of microfabrication process. 

Areas of expertise:
• Optical lithography (direct laser lithography)
• Sputtering and ion beam deposition
• Physical pattern transfer tools
• Ellipsometry and profilometry
• Scanning electron microscopy inspection
• Electrical and magnetic characterization
• Wire bonding encapsulation
• Soft lithography techniques (PDMS) for microfluidics
• Micro-spotting of biological probes
profile_positions.title: R&D Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Certified Software Tester and Quality Assurance with experience in supporting different project phases for customers. 

• Analysis and assessment of requirement specifications
• Identification of test conditions
• Creation of test cases and test procedure specifications 
• Logging and results documentation 

Areas of Expertise: 
• Quality Assurance
• Functional and Non-Functional Tests
• Automation Tests
• Enterprise Resource Planning and Financial Management - SAP
profile_positions.title: Testing & Quality Assurance

profile_positions.description:
• Analysis of business requirement and process improvements
• Preparation of business documentation, including business and fields rules specification
• Layout design
profile_positions.title: Functional Analyst

profile_positions.description:
At INESC-MN, I developed my master thesis aiming to integrate the polymerase chain reaction in a magnetoresistive biochip for biological detection on a portable platform. 

Key role: Full microfabrication process of the magnetoresistive biochip, optimization of spin valve sensor material stack, and electrical and magnetic characterization of the final chip. 

Areas of expertise:
• Optical lithography (direct laser lithography)
• Sputtering and ion beam deposition
• Plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition 
• Ion beam milling 	
• Ellipsometry and profilometry
• Scanning electron microscopy inspection
• Annealing and electrical and magnetic characterization
• PCB assembling
